trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There were no other sightings in Edmonton on or around March 7th 2012
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw about 5 lights at various locations over Edmonton. Left my 16 Mp camera at home. Ran into office and got my 2 Mp camera and snapped a few pictures. No nite vision on the camera. The one in the picture attached was moving and then hovered. I was careful not to jiggle the camera. The vertical white streak to the left of the ufo is a reflection off the back south wall of our shop next door.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Saw lights moving in the sky over Edmonton
